hero.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
hero.subtitle: The eagerly awaited sequel to the award-winning Hollow Knight
hero.description: Play as Hornet, princess-protector of Pharloom, and discover a whole new kingdom filled with deadly enemies, strange characters, and ancient secrets.
hero.platforms: Available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox

features.title: Game Features
features.subtitle: Discover what awaits in the kingdom of Pharloom

combat.title: Fast-Paced Combat
combat.description: Master Hornet's needle and thread abilities in intense, skill-based combat encounters.

exploration.title: Vast Kingdom
exploration.description: Explore over 150 new areas across the haunting, beautiful kingdom of Pharloom.

story.title: Rich Storyline
story.description: Uncover the mysteries of Pharloom and Hornet's destiny as princess-protector.

story.title: The Story
story.subtitle: A tale of silk and steel
story.content: Captured and brought to an unfamiliar land, Hornet must battle foes and solve mysteries as she ascends to the peak of a vast, haunted kingdom ruled by silk and song.

characters.title: New Characters
characters.description: Meet a cast of over 165 new enemies, bosses, and characters in your journey through Pharloom.

world.title: Beautiful World
world.description: Experience hand-drawn visuals and atmospheric music that brings the kingdom of Pharloom to life.

soundtrack.title: Original Soundtrack
soundtrack.subtitle: Music by Christopher Larkin
soundtrack.description: Immerse yourself in the haunting melodies that define the world of Silksong.

timeline.title: Development Timeline
timeline.description: Track the journey of Hollow Knight: Silksong from announcement to release
timeline.pageDescription: Complete timeline of Hollow Knight: Silksong development milestones, announcements, and updates from Team Cherry.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Hollow Knight: Silksong
faq.pageDescription: Frequently asked questions and answers about Hollow Knight: Silksong, including release date, platforms, and gameplay information.

platforms.title: Available Platforms
platforms.description: Play Hollow Knight: Silksong on your preferred gaming platform
platforms.pageTitle: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Platforms & System Requirements
platforms.pageDescription: Complete guide to Hollow Knight: Silksong platforms, system requirements, pricing, and availability across PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox.

checklist.subtitle: Prepare yourself for the ultimate Hollow Knight: Silksong experience
checklist.description: Track your preparation for Hollow Knight: Silksong's release
checklist.pageDescription: Complete checklist to prepare for Hollow Knight: Silksong release, including platform setup, achievements, and community activities.

account.title: Account Setup

lore.title: Lore & Story Preparation
lore.description: Refresh your knowledge of Hollow Knight's world and story

community.description: Connect with the Hollow Knight community for the Silksong journey

compare.description: Compare features and differences between Hollow Knight and Silksong
compare.pageTitle: Hollow Knight vs Silksong - Complete Comparison
compare.pageDescription: Detailed comparison between Hollow Knight and Hollow Knight: Silksong, highlighting differences in gameplay, story, and features.

tools.description: Useful tools and resources for Hollow Knight: Silksong

developers.title: About Team Cherry
developers.description: Meet the developers behind Hollow Knight: Silksong
developers.pageTitle: Team Cherry - Developers of Hollow Knight: Silksong
developers.pageDescription: Learn about Team Cherry, the indie game development studio behind Hollow Knight and Hollow Knight: Silksong.
developers.about: Team Cherry is an independent game development studio founded by Ari Gibson and William Pellen, creators of the critically acclaimed Hollow Knight series.
